src

Class SearchLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.SearchLogic

  • public class SearchLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    The SearchLogic Class: Singleton class to gather information about the object to search for, generate the CQL query needed and compute the derivation of the Objects found. Singleton NOT threadsafe.
    Author:
    Lennard Flegel

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SearchLogic getInstance(java.util.ArrayList<Searchobject> searchObjects,
                                      java.lang.Double tolLen,
                                      java.lang.Double tolAng)
        Method to realize Singleton-Pattern
        Parameters:
        searchObjects - List of Searchobject types describing the pattern to look for defined by the users GUI input.
        tolLen - Tolerance the user set for edge length
        tolAng - Tolerance the user set for angles
        Returns:
        the only SearchLogic object

      • getInstance

        public static SearchLogic getInstance()
        Same for empty cons.
        Returns:
        The only creatable instance of this

      • generateQuery

        public java.lang.String generateQuery()
        This method generates a CQL query string based on the searchObjects ArrayList Member. To realize the ability of searching with a given tolerance, the query consists of a match for a (relatively)long list of node-rel-node patterns and a (relatively)long where clause. The return of the query is the entire node and rel.Angle. Columns look like this: n1.Url | n1.Description | n1.ObjectId | n1.Length | r1to2.Angle | n2.Length | r2to3.Angle | n3.Length | r3to4.Angle | ... | ...
        Returns:
        The CQL string to query for the properties given in the searchObjects ArrayList

      • calcSimilarity

        public java.util.ArrayList<Foundobject> calcSimilarity(org.neo4j.graphdb.Result result)
        This Method calculates the similarity (rather derivation) to the exact pattern entered for query for every row in result and creates an array of Foundobjects containing only the most similar representation per Object found. To calculate the derivation, the lengths and angles from both the wanted and the found patterns are compared in pairs and the sum of those differences divided by the amount of edges/angles to normalize the result.
        Parameters:
        result - The result of a CQL query
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Foundobjects, containing only the most similar representation per Object found
